findings.title: Public Writable _unlockIntervalsCount From vestedAmount()
findings.description: The `_unlockIntervalsCount` variable can be updated publicly from the `vestedAmount()` routine, which needs to be corrected as it could delay the release of vested tokens to beneficiaries.

findings.title: Improved Initialization Logic in VeERC20Upgradeable
findings.description: Abuse of initializer() modifier needs to be corrected in VeWom and VeERC20Upgradeable contracts.

findings.title: Suggested Use Of whenNotPaused For depositFor()
findings.description: The MasterWombat contract's depositFor() function does not use the whenNotPaused modifier, allowing transactions to proceed even when the contract is paused.

findings.title: Proper Cleanup in emergencyWithdraw()
findings.description: In the MasterWombat contract, the emergencyWithdraw() function does not properly reset pending rewards when users withdraw their assets from the pool, leading to potential loss of rewards.

findings.title: Consistent WAD Denomination Between minimumAmount And amount
findings.description: Inconsistency in denomination precision between `amount` and `minimumAmount` may lead to unexpected withdrawal results.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Wombat protocol, there exist certain privileged accounts that play critical roles in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.

findings.title: 3.7 Incompatibility With Deflationary Tokens
findings.description: Incompatibility with deflationary tokens due to incorrect asset transfer and minting of LP tokens in Pool contract's deposit() and swap() functions.

findings.title: Suggested Events Generation In Wombat
findings.description: Lack of emitting an event to reflect newMasterWombat changes in MasterWombat contract.
